trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Minebern looks as though he's about to tear his hair out.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_00<tab>Slay a thistle mole and obtain its fat.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the thistle mole fat to Minebern.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_TODO_02<tab>Spread thistle mole oil on the windmill.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_000<tab>I tell you, this windmill gives me nothing but grief. The damned thing won't stop creaking!

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_001<tab>Putting thistle mole oil on the...moving bits at the top, makes it turn more smoothly, and I'd get up there and do it myself if I hadn't thrown my back out. Not to mention we've used up our supply of the stuff.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_002<tab>Would you be willing to do it? There's coin in it for you.

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_003<tab>It shouldn't be too hard to find thistle moles around here. Give them a few licks and they'll keel right over. Wringing the fat out is a pain in the arse, though. Once you've got a decent amount, bring it to me.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_010<tab>Chasing around after thistle moles is not the sort of thing you want to be doing with a bad back, I tell you.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_020<tab>Now there's a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who smells like <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s skinned a mole or two.
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_021<tab>Yes, that ought to do it. Give me a moment and I'll fix up a batch of the oil...

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_100_021<tab>There you go, all ready. Now, be a good <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> and climb to the top and spread this on the movey bits. Don't ask me what they're called, I didn't build the bloody thing!
TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_050<tab>Good work. I'm not sure if the creaking had any negative effect on the mill itself, but it was bloody annoying!

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_051<tab>I suppose you're wondering what we'd need a windmill for in the first place, seeing as we've no crops to mill into flour. It's actually used for drawing up water from deep underground.

TEXT_LUCKZG013_03498_MINEBERN_000_052<tab>Of course, if anything were to go wrong, we'd have a serious problem on our hands, and it's my job to make sure that doesn't happen. Anyway, here's your payment. You've earned it.
